fields.name: observation_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the observation in this table.

fields.name: deployment_id
fields.description: Reference (foreign key) to the `deployments.csv` table.

fields.name: file_name
fields.description: Name of a multimedia file which is a source of this observation.

fields.name: file_mimetype
fields.description: Mimetype of a multimedia file which is a source of this observation.

fields.name: file_location
fields.description: Url or a relative path to a multimedia file which is a source of this observation. Additional information on how to access this file is provided in a package-level metadata.

fields.name: date_recorded
fields.description: An ISO8601 format string e.g. `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ` in UTC time. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601.

fields.name: is_empty
fields.description: A flag indicating if file is empty i.e. not providing an observation.

fields.name: sequence_based
fields.description: A flag indicating if classifications were made per sequence of files or for each single file.

fields.name: sequence_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of sequence of files considered as one independent observation in this table. Sequence can be a series of pictures taken one by one or the 'event' with a pre-defined maximum time-interval between sub-sequent observations which are considered as one independent observation (see a package-level metadata for a definition of event).

fields.name: observation_type
fields.description: Type of observation.

fields.name: species_latin
fields.description: A scientific name of identified species.

fields.name: species_common
fields.description: A common name of identified species.

fields.name: uncertainty
fields.description: How accurate is this classification? Specified as probability (provide an approximate value for human classifications).

fields.name: count
fields.description: Number of individuals identified (optionally of given age, sex and behaviour; see below). Interpretation depends on the value of `sequence_based` field.

fields.name: count_new
fields.description: Number of 'NEW' individuals identified for this file taking into account the entire sequence (optionally of given age, sex and behaviour; see below).

fields.name: age
fields.description: Age of identified individuals

fields.name: sex
fields.description: Sex of identified individuals

fields.name: behaviour
fields.description: Dominant behaviour of identified individuals.

fields.name: individual_id
fields.description: Individual animal unique identifier within this project.

fields.name: _id
fields.description: Internal attribute of data management system: ID of this observation.
